title: Which House Republicans voted against Trump bill?
shortDescription: Here are the House Republicans who opposed Trump's legislative package of tax reductions and Medicaid cuts.

title: Trump seeks credit for Waffle House dropping 50-cent egg surcharge
shortDescription: "Thank you President Trump!" President Trump wrote on social media in response to Waffle House dropping its 50-cent egg surcharge.

title: Trump hits Iran with new sanctions as administration ramps up pressure
shortDescription: Trump's administration spent months trying to convince Tehran to enter into a nuclear deal before it joined a bombing campaign spearheaded by Israel.

title: Melania Trump makes rare public appearance at D.C. children's hospital
shortDescription: Trump brought fluffy teddy bears for the kids at Children’s National Hospital and chatted with them about their favorites sports, food and hobbies.

title: When do taxes and Medicaid work requirements in GOP tax bill start?
shortDescription: Different provisions of the GOP tax and spending bill will kick in over the next year or so. Many are set to expire just before Trump's term ends.

title: Trump holds call with Putin after pausing some weapons transfers to Ukraine
shortDescription: The U.S. said a day prior that it would pause the delivery of some weapons to Ukraine as the Pentagon conducts a review of its munition stockpiles.

title: Police: 21-year-old congressional intern fatally shot in D.C.
shortDescription: Detectives believe UMass student Eric Tarpinian-Jachym was caught in the middle of a shooting and was not the intended target.

title: House clears key hurdle on tax megabill | The Excerpt
shortDescription: USA TODAY National Correspondent Marco della Cava puts Diddy's trial in context after a verdict and more.

title: Hakeem Jeffries breaks record while bashing Trump's mega bill
shortDescription: The minority leader used his unlimited talking time to set back Republicans' final vote timeline.

title: Tenafly's Edan Alexander, freed from Hamas, is headed to White House
shortDescription: Released after almost two years of captivity, Edan Alexander, joined by his parents, is scheduled to meet with President Trump and the first lady.

title: A 'big' Trump win: Congress passes president's tax and spending bill
shortDescription: President Trump is scheduled to sign the bill into law at 5 p.m. on July 4 at the White House, locking in tax reductions and Medicaid cuts.

title: Trump had his military parade. Now he's got America's 250th birthday.
shortDescription: President Trump is set to kick off a one-year countdown to America's 250th birthday with a speech July 3 at the Iowa State Fairgrounds in Des Moines.

title: Pressure on House to pass Trump's 'Big Beautiful Bill' by July 4th deadline
shortDescription: The pressure is one for House Republicans to pass President Trump's massive tax cuts and spending bill by his July 4 deadline.

title: Trans athletes or $175M? Why Penn struck a deal with Trump
shortDescription: The University of Pennsylvania agreed to apologize to female swimmers who competed alongside Lia Thomas, a transgender former NCAA champion.

title: Space shuttle would move to Texas under GOP spending and tax bill
shortDescription: Space shuttle would move from Smithsonian Museum to Texas under GOP spending and tax bill

title: Paramount Global settles with Trump for $16 Million
shortDescription: Paramount Global, parent of CBS News, has agreed to a $16 million settlement with President Trump over his defamation-style lawsuit.

title: House takes up President Trump's sweeping tax and spending bill
shortDescription: Republicans are working to gather enough support to begin debate on U.S. President Donald Trump's sweeping tax and spending bill, which was passed by the Senate.

title: How did the Senate change the GOP tax and spend bill?
shortDescription: How did the Senate change the GOP tax and spend bill?

title: Trump: CNN may be prosecuted for ICE app reporting
shortDescription: President Donald Trump claimed CNN may be prosecuted for reporting on an app that alerts users to nearby ICE agents.

title: Senate budget bill deals big blow to renewable energy
shortDescription: The Senate bill effectively phases out renewable energy tax credits after 2026 if projects haven't started construction.

title: Trump asylum ban at US-Mexico border blocked by federal judge
shortDescription: The ruling is a setback for President Donald Trump, a Republican who recaptured the White House promising a vast immigration crackdown.

title: Student loans to a space shuttle: Surprises abound in Senate tax bill
shortDescription: From gun silencers to the child tax credit, there are several secluded provisions lurking in the Senate's version of sweeping Republican tax bill.
